metadata.title: CVE-2017-9052 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue, also known as DW201703-006, was discovered in libdwarf 2017-03-21. A heap-based buffer over-read in dwarf_formsdata() is due to a failure to check a pointer for being in bounds (in a few places in this function) and a failure in a check in dwarf_attr_list().

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180129-1').
